articles.title: Olympics live: Kiwi sprint cyclists hit the track, women's pursuit team's medal hopes dashed - Stuff.co.nz
articles.description: Follow as the American gymnastics superstar joins the field for the balance beam final after her dramatic decision to step back last week.
articles.content:
New Zealand has won two Olympic gold medals in canoeing, a silver in sailing and, a bronze in boxing with the day far from being over.
 Lisa Carrington has won a third consecutive Olympic gold in he… [+2888 chars]

articles.author: Brian Windhorst
articles.title: Team USA overcomes sluggish start vs. Spain thanks to Kevin Durant, advances to Olympic men's basketball semifinals - ESPN
articles.description: Kevin Durant's shooting rescued Team USA again Tuesday, as the Americans overcame a 10-point deficit and withstood 38 points from Ricky Rubio to beat Spain 95-81 and advance to the semifinals of the Olympic men's basketball tournament.
articles.content:
SAITAMA, Japan -- Kevin Durant's case as the greatest Olympic basketball player ever is growing by the game. Team USA is badly in need of the chase.
For the third straight Summer Olympics, Durant ha… [+4797 chars]

articles.title: Warholm destroys WR to win 400m hurdles gold - SuperSport
articles.description: A world record had been predicted but Norway's Karsten Warholm did not just break it, he destroyed it to hold off American Rai Benjamin and win a superb men's Olympic 400 metres hurdles final.

articles.title: Covid third wave: Americans 'scared and angry' as pandemic worsens - BBC News
articles.description: As the Delta variant causes a rethink about risk, Americans are battling to keep a feeling of normalcy.
articles.content:
By Marianna BradyBBC News, Washington

articles.description: Canadian captain Christine Sinclair comforted club teammate Lindsey Horan after the Canadians booted the USWNT out of gold-medal contention in Tokyo.

articles.description: American comedian Kathy Griffin urges fans to "stay up to date on your medical checkups" after revealing she will undergo treatment for lung cancer.
